as.description: The element or component the Tab.Panel should render as.
as.description_zh: Tab.Panel 应呈现为的元素或组件。

static.description:
Whether the element should ignore the selected index.Note: static and unmount can not be used at the same time. You will
get a TypeScript error if you try to do it.
static.description_zh:
元素是否应忽略所选索引。注意：static 和 unmount 不能同时使用。您将
如果尝试这样做，则会收到 TypeScript 错误。

unmount.description:
Whether the element should be unmounted or hidden based on the selected
index.Note: static and unmount can not be used at the same time. You will
get a TypeScript error if you try to do it.
unmount.description_zh:
元素是应该卸载还是隐藏基于所选
指数。注意：static 和 unmount 不能同时使用。您将
如果尝试这样做，则会收到 TypeScript 错误。

:selected.description: Whether or not the Tab.Panel is currently selected.
